version_description:
Optimize video download speed and stability
Optimize firmware upgrade
Optimize Travel Log function
Optimize the display effect
Fixed bug and performance improvements, and more

Show driving speed
Turn off the GPS feature
Travel Log can be deleted
Add three filters
Switch 12 hours /24 hours
(automatic switching according to the type of user's phone)
DashCam installation and connection guidance
Optimize upgrade feature
UI modification
Bug fixed

-G-Sensor Sensitivity Settings - ability to adjust the sensitivity of the G-Sensor
-Parking Monitor Function (Activate in Setting)
-Loop Recording - going to be changed from 1min, 3min, 5min to 1min, 2min, 3min
-Bug fixes and performance improvements

6. More platforms to share
7. Switch the device in the My Dash Cam

9. Bugs fixed and perfomance improvements

1. Change the default sorting order of the album to sort by time.
2. A play button is Added in the center of video, when the real-time video is paused.
3. Bugs fixed.
